channel.title: Modoc County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Modoc County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Entering California - Modoc County Highway 1
item.description: Entering California on Modoc County Highway 1 south. Distance to Fort Bidwell and Cedarville. Taken on the road between Adel, Oregon and Cedarville, California.

item.title: CH-1 (Main St.) at CA-299 - Cedarville
item.description: CH-1 (Main St.) at CA-299 in Cedarville. Turn left for CA-299 west to Alturas.

item.title: CA-299 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-299 west. Distance to Bieber, Burney, and Redding.

item.title: CA-139 South/CA-299 West at CA-139/CA-299 Split
item.description: CA-139 South/CA-299 West at CA-139/CA-299 Split. Turn left for CA-139 South to Eagle Lake, Susanville, and Reno (Nevada).

item.title: CA-139 South/CA-299 West Approaching CA-139/CA-299 Split
item.description: CA-139 South/CA-299 West Approaching CA-139/CA-299 split. Turn left for CA-139 south to Eagle Lake, Susanville, and Reno (Nevada).

item.title: CA-139/CA-299 - Adin
item.description: CA-139 South/CA-299 West in Adin

item.title: CA-139 South/CA-299 West - Lookout Jct.
item.description: CA-139 South/CA-299 West at Lookout Jct. Merge left to continue west on CA-299 (and south on CA-139).

item.title: CA-139 South/CA-299 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on CA-139 South/CA-299 West. Distance to Adin, Susanville (via CA-139), and Redding (via CA-299).

item.title: CA-139 South at CA-299
item.description: CA-139 South at CA-299. Turn left for CA-299 East and Hospital (in Alturas); turn right for CA-299 West/CA-139 South. CA-139 joins CA-299 west to Adin.

item.title: CA-139 South at CA-299
item.description: CA-139 South at CA-299. Turn left for CA-299 east to Alturas; right for CA-299 West/CA-139 South to Susanville.

item.title: CA-139 South Approaching CA-299
item.description: CA-139 South approaching CA-299 to Susanville and Alturas.

item.title: CA-139 South Approaching CA-299
item.description: CA-139 South approaching CA-299 in Modoc County.

item.title: CA-139 South Approaching Inspection Station
item.description: CA-139 south approaching the Tulelake Agricultural Inspection Station.

item.title: CA-139 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-139 south. Distance to Canby, Alturas, and Susanville.

item.title: Forest Road 97 at CA-139
item.description: Forest Road 97 at CA-139 in Modoc County. Turn right for CA-139 south to Canby; left for CA-139 north to Klamath Falls (Oregon).

item.title: CA-139 South at CA-299
item.description: CA-139 South at CA-299 in Canby. CA-139 south joins CA-299 west to Adin.

item.title: Begin CA-299 West
item.description: Begin CA-299 west at Nevada-California line.

item.title: CA-299 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on CA-299 west, at Nevada line.

item.title: CA-299 West at CA-139 North
item.description: CA-299 west at CA-139 north. CA-139 follows CA-299 west to Adin.

item.title: CA-299 West at Suprise Valley Road
item.description: CA-299 west at Surprise Valley Road north to Fort Bidwell, south to Eagleville.

item.title: CA-299 West at US-395
item.description: CA-299 west approaching US-395. CA-299 multiplexes US-395 south into Alturas.

item.title: CA-299 West at US-395
item.description: CA-299 west at US-395 north to Lakeview, and south to Alturas.

item.title: CA-299 West in Cedarville
item.description: CA-299 west approaching Cedarville.

item.title: US-395 South - Agricultural Inspection
item.description: US-395 South/CA-299 west at Alturas Agricultural Inspection Station.

item.title: CA-139 North Approaching CA-299
item.description: CA-139 north approaching CA-299.

item.title: CA-139 North at CA-299
item.description: CA-139 north at CA-299 west to Redding, and east to Alturas.

item.title: CA-139 North at CA-299
item.description: CA-139 north at CA-299. CA-139 north follows CA-299 east to Canby.

item.title: CA-139 North at CA-299 in Aden
item.description: CA-139 north approaching CA-299. Klamath Falls, 101 miles, on CA-139 North/CA-299 East.

item.title: CA-299 East at US-395
item.description: CA-299 east at US-395 south to Susanville and Reno (NV).

item.title: CA-299 East/CA-139 North Approaching CA-139 North
item.description: CA-299 East/CA-139 North approaching CA-139 north to Tulelake and Klamath Falls.

item.title: CA-299 East/CA-139 North at CA-139 North
item.description: CA-299 East/CA-139 North at CA-139 north to Tulelake and Klamath Falls.

item.title: CA-299 East/CA-139 North at CA-139 North
item.description: CA-299 west/CA-139 north at CA-139 north.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north to New Pine Creek, Lakeview, and Pendleton in Davis Creek.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north to Alturas, Lakeview, and Burns in Likely.

item.title: US-395 North - New Pine Creek
item.description: New Pine Creek limits on US-395 north. New Pine Creek is on the Oregon-California Stateline near Goose Lake.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-299
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-299 west in Alturas.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-299 East
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-299 east to Cedarville and Gerlach, NV in Modoc County.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-299 East
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-299 east to Cedarville and Gerlach, NV in Modoc County.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-299 East
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-299 east to Cedarville and Gerlach, NV in Modoc County.

item.title: US-395 North in Alturas
item.description: US-395 north in Alturas.

item.title: US-395 South - Truck Speed
item.description: Truck speed limits on US-395 south at southern edge of Alturas.

item.title: US-395 North at CA-299
item.description: CA-299 Junction on US-395 North

item.title: US-395 South - Postmile
item.description: California Postmile on US-395 South at the Oregon-California border. This postmile is attached to the California welcome sign. The number at the top refers to the route (US-395). The second line is the county abbreviation (Modoc County), and the bottom number is the mile from the previous county or state line. In this case 61.56 miles from the Lassen/Modoc County Line.

item.title: US-395 South - Welcome To California
item.description: California Welcome Sign on US-395 South
